title: Why is reporting Boosters and Botters so difficult? * /r/leagueoflegends

embed.description: As we near the end of the season we have all learned to expect a massive increase in booster activity as low elo players salty about not getting rewards they cannot earn themselves instead pay bored, high elo players to artificially raise their accounts for them.

body:
After trying to report an obvious booster today I realized how little Riot care about enabling us as players to assist in tracking down these players, hence the post.

 Even reporting botters has no actual tab in support.

replies.body: I got accused of scripting once but i just had the game of my life. Never been accused since (sadly )
ahaha I had that one too, playing ziggs first time, and the enemy kayle just couldn't dodge for a mil$ so she ranged and complained about scripting and auto aimers
Yeah mine was versing a vayne who moved very predictably and was like a magnet for every skill shot.
I'm sure it's been said before but, there should be a report option in post screen.

Yeah it's kinda pathetic really, however that being said, things do happen to the reports you send through to support about botters.

I got a Yasuo scripter banned at some point like 6 months ago for the blatant as fuck Wind Wall script he was using.
Like I said, I saw someone who clearly got a diamond border in low silver last week so they clearly aren't that on the ball.

Boosting is allowed.
You don't get banned for boosting, because someone else is just playing on your account, that's not bannable because you can't prove that they are getting boosted.
O_o you know sharing your account full stop is bannable and against the Terms of Service?
